<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Context-sensitive <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/captureanalysis">CaptureAnalysis</a> provider, which computes and caches the earliest common dominator closure of all captures. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Context-sensitive <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/captureanalysis">CaptureAnalysis</a> provider, which computes and caches the earliest common dominator closure of all captures.

It provides a good approximation to a precise &quot;captures before&quot; analysis.

Definition at line 173 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### isNotCapturedBefore() {#a7c3074603b84ea51ddaa985117ebce55}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool EarliestEscapeAnalysis::isNotCapturedBefore (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Object, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, bool OrAt)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether Object is not captured before instruction I.

If OrAt is true, captures by instruction I itself are also considered.

If I is nullptr, then captures at any point will be considered.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00191">191</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#l00213">213</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp">BasicAliasAnalysis.cpp</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00174">174</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.

### EarliestEscapes {#a6f7d09baee799dac7ed5b1c631df4b5d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const Value &#42;, Instruction &#42;&gt; llvm::EarliestEscapeAnalysis::EarliestEscapes</>}>
Map from identified local object to an instruction before which it does not escape, or nullptr if it never escapes.

The &quot;earliest&quot; instruction may be a conservative approximation, e.g. the first instruction in the function is always a legal choice.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00181">181</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Inst2Obj {#adab81b30e563efd45abf47273fa17fe6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;Instruction &#42;, TinyPtrVector&lt;const Value &#42;&gt; &gt; llvm::EarliestEscapeAnalysis::Inst2Obj</>}>
Reverse map from instruction to the objects it is the earliest escape for.

This is used for cache invalidation purposes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00185">185</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
